_header: Western wind when will thou blow
_description: Expressing yearning for his mistress — one quatrain

BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
Westron wynde when wyll thow blowthe smalle rayne downe can
                    RayneCryst yf my love were in my ArmysAnd I in my bed A
                    gayne
